attributes.action: Commit to accepting any and all Ukrainian refugees; create a fast, safe passage.
attributes.additional_details:
War has returned to Europe. Various governments of our continent have opened their borders to the people of Ukraine, but as of 27 Feb 2022, we seem - if anything - to have closed ours. 

Do we want the history books to read that when this time came upon our generation, we failed to help? Do we want to see an avoidable humanitarian crisis develop in Ukraine's neighbouring countries, overwhelmed by refugees?

We should example for the rest of Western Europe. We can do this, and therefore we must.

rejection.details:
We currently have two petitions open on this topic, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
